name: maxVehiclesInPlatoon
description: Controls maximum number of cars allowed for a platoon

name: catchupDistance
description: Cars try to catchup the platoon-ahead if it's closer than this value (in m.)

name: maxPlatoonGap
description: Gap (in m.) below which cars are considered as a platoon

name: platoonSplitTime
description: Time (in secs.) until a car which maintains a distance larger than maxPlatoonGap from its leader within the platoon is split off

name: joinDistance
description: Distance (in m.) that is used to determine a car's joining condition to a platoon (if car's arrival position is within the arrival interval of a platoon)
